items.title: Webnova
items.description: My development venture focused on crafting modern web apps. Built with Vite, Tailwind CSS and MagicUI components, emphasizing fast iterations and polished UI.

items.title: Athlos
items.description: Entry/exit tracking, revenue dashboards, attendance alerts and member insights. Designed to give gyms real-time visibility and proactive notifications.

items.title: Condecoro
items.description: Modern redesign powered by Supabase, Vite and Tailwind. Clean layout, improved performance and a contemporary visual language.

items.title: ChefSync
items.description: My favorite ongoing SaaS: a restaurant POS built with Next.js, Supabase, HeroUI, Tailwind and deployed on Vercel. Includes a Python companion app for silent printing, intuitive UI and practical workflows.
